headline: Assessing Iron Mountain (NYSE:IRM) Valuation After Strong Recent Share Price Performance
summary: Recent performance snapshot for Iron Mountain Iron Mountain (IRM) has drawn investor attention after a strong recent stretch, with the share price showing a return of about 18% over the past month and roughly 31% over the past 3 months. Those moves come alongside reported annual revenue of about US$6.9b and net income of roughly US$145m, giving investors concrete figures to compare against the stock’s recent trading history and overall value score of 5.
